column4: If I type "apt-get remove kubuntu-desktop", will it just remove that package itself (while leaving alone all packages that depend on it) or will it start disassembling the entire distro (which depends on it)?  I just want to get rid of kde-helpcenter4 which is preventing the upgrading of my other components.
the *buntu-desktop psackatges are just meta-packages. removing them wont affect much
i thought it showed up on both. and had some settings. but i havent tried multi mon. in ages
